author: cmadrid1
body:
This PR adds two new shapes for simulation. One shape for the scintillator+Y11 and one for simulation reconstruction (206). The 206 shape is the convolution of the scintillator+Y11 and SiPM shapes.

Also, a new SiPM pulse shape (shape 207) for 2018data.
Derived from data of 2017 phase scan.

We are merging this PR with #21356 for simplicity. 

**Validation:**

Simulation:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/677823/contributions/2775512/attachments/1557608/2462943/DigiReco206Shape3.pdf

https://baylor.app.box.com/s/0gvh0dq9hn8buw43yze16fcag127n185

2018 Data shape (207):
https://indico.cern.ch/event/677823/contributions/2775510/attachments/1560954/2457326/Shape207_test.pdf

Both:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/678759/contributions/2788320/attachments/1570351/2476966/DPG-Reco-CMSWeek-Dec2017.pdf
****

Impact on upgraded HBHE simulation:
1. New scintillator+Y11 shape used for simulating SiPM responds
2. Now using the 206 shape for sim reco and 207 for data reco
3. Added a M3 version of the 206 and 207shape

@hatakeyamak @kpedro88 @mariadalfonso @hmiaozh
title: HBHE: Adding new scintillator+Y11, 206, and 207 shapes for simulation and 2018 Data
